title: Shikkakumon no Saikyou Kenja
synopsis: In a world of magic, the powers and future of a mage are predetermined at birth through so-called "Marks"â€”four symbols that categorize a human's aptitude for magic. Lamenting the fact that his mark was considered ill-suited for combat and only useful for magic augmentation, an incredibly skilled sage decided to reincarnate thousands years in the future.
